description:
Golden Globe winner and Oscar nominee Lady Gaga is the first returning cast member to officially sign on for American Horror Story Season 6.金球奖得主兼奥斯卡提名获得者Lady Gaga成为第一位签约回归《美国恐怖故事》第六季的原卡司阵容。

The singer earned a Globe for her starring role as the Countess in the last AHS installment, Hotel, and confirmed that she will be back for more during a radio interview with Z100 New York on Friday. However, Gaga couldn't confirm whether or not she'll return as a series regular or appear in a smaller role this time around.Lady Gaga此前凭借在《美国恐怖故事》第五季中的精彩表演赢得了一座金球奖，她在周五的之声采访中确认将会回归，但还不确定这次是出演常规角色还是小角色。

"I can't promise you how or when or anything like that," Gaga teased.Gaga戏称：“我不能给你们任何保证。”

Few other details about American Horror Story Season 6 are known. FX President John Landgraf previously let it slip that the season will be set in present day, but will heavily feature flashbacks. And creator Ryan Murphy revealed that the new season will be "very, very different" than Hotel. "目前《美国恐怖故事》第六季还未发布更多详细信息。FX总裁John Landgraf之前曾经透露第六季很快就要启动拍摄，而且会有大量的闪回剧情。制作人Ryan Murphy表示，新季相较于第五季会“非常非常的不一样。”

There's also the possibility that there will be double the Horror Story going forward, with one season in the fall and then another in the spring.目前不排除会有两季《美国恐怖故事》的可能性，这两季分别在今秋和明年春播出。

title: Lady Gaga回归《美国恐怖故事》第六季
